description.hobbies: Learning new stuff, video games, chilling, swimming, movies
description.about_me: I am full stack engineer with a liking for UI/UX design. I am tenacious, passionate about solving problems with code. I have a demonstrated history of working in the software industry and have worked as a software engineer in industries such as finance, health and media. I love constantly learning and improving my skills as an engineer and person. Currently in my spare time, I do part time work for WeCP by creating programming problems and providing test cases for said problems in NodeJS, ReactJS and Angular. I have experience coding in Javascript, Java, Python and C/C++. I also dabble in Golang and PHP.
description.weekends: During the weekends you can find me doing UI/UX design for some passion projects, hanging out with my friends and learning something new.
